text: Ojo on ʙuthoro pojhoe hast, ki ʙo on roh ʙiravand jo onhoro dasthoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙigirand jo caşmhoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙuʙinand jo gūşhoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙişnavand? Pas ma'ʙudone, ki şumo parastiş mekuned, cunin cizho dar onho vuçud doşta naʙoşad, onhoro iʙodat kardani şumo ʙaroi cist? Bigū ej Rasul, ʙaroi in muşrikon: «Şarikonatonro ʙixoned va ʙar ziddi man makr kuned va maro mūhlat madihed, ʙalki ʙa on şitoʙed. Zero sarparasti man Alloh ast, ki maro sarparastī menamojad
